layout.singingstanza: Let's go on! For -- ward come! A heart that is lov -- ing Him, A heart that is will -- ing, A heart that's up -- lift -- ed, No, not de -- feat -- ed! Let's go on! For -- ward come To the Son! We are Your ves -- sels, Cre -- at -- ed to be Man in Your i -- mage To be filled up with Thee. You're my en -- joy -- ment O -- ver -- flow -- ing me! I'm a man in Your i -- mage, Thus ex -- press -- ing Thee!

lyrics.stanza: A heart that is loving Him, A heart that is willing, A heart that's uplifted, No, not defeated!
Let's go on! Forward come To the Son!
We are Your vessels, Created to be Man in Your image To be filled up with Thee. You're my enjoyment Overflowing me! I'm a man in Your image, Thus expressing Thee!
A spirit that's burning, A heart that is bubbling, Saints that are eating And always drinking!
Let's go on! Forward come To the Son!
Spirit releasing, Saints that are feasting, Not analyzing, Or criticizing.
Let's go on! Forward come To the Son!
Life so enjoyable, Else it be terrible, But He's so wonderful, And so available!
Let's go on! Forward come To the Son!
